statements: SELECT * FROM light_intensity_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, intensity FROM light_intensity_data WHERE intensity > 50
SELECT * FROM light_intensity_data WHERE location = 'Room A'
SELECT sensor_id, intensity FROM light_intensity_data ORDER BY intensity DESC
SELECT AVG(intensity) AS avg_intensity FROM light_intensity_data
SELECT * FROM light_intensity_data ORDER BY intensity DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(intensity) as avg_intensity FROM light_intensity_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(intensity) > 50
SELECT sensor_id, location, intensity, timestamp FROM light_intensity_data WHERE intensity > 100 AND location LIKE '%kitchen%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(intensity) as max_intensity, MIN(intensity) as min_intensity FROM light_intensity_data
SELECT sensor_id, location, intensity, timestamp FROM light_intensity_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, light_intensity FROM sensor_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, light_intensity, recorded_at FROM sensor_data ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, building_id, light_intensity, recorded_at FROM sensor_data WHERE light_intensity > 100;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_plan WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.5 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE light_intensity > 50 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT building_id, AVG(light_intensity) AS avg_intensity FROM sensor_data GROUP BY building_id HAVING AVG(light_intensity) > 30 ORDER BY avg_intensity DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, building_id, light_intensity, recorded_at FROM sensor_data WHERE building_id = 2 AND recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT sensor_id, building_id, light_intensity, recorded_at FROM sensor_data JOIN efficiency_plan ON sensor_data.building_id = efficiency_plan.building_id WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT building_id, MAX(efficiency_rating) AS max_rating FROM efficiency_plan GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY max_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM LightIntensityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, intensity FROM LightIntensityData WHERE intensity > 50;
SELECT building_name, address FROM BuildingInformation WHERE floor_count > 5 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyPlan WHERE target_intensity BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT building_name, target_savings FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EfficiencyPlan ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EfficiencyPlan.building_id ORDER BY target_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingInformation WHERE floor_count > 3 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EfficiencyPlan ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EfficiencyPlan.building_id WHERE EfficiencyPlan.target_intensity > 500;
SELECT * FROM LightIntensityData WHERE intensity BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_name, target_intensity FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EfficiencyPlan ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EfficiencyPlan.building_id WHERE target_savings < 1000;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyPlan WHERE target_intensity > 300 AND target_savings < 500 ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM light_intensity_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, intensity FROM light_intensity_data WHERE intensity > 500;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT plan_id, target_intensity, start_date, end_date FROM efficiency_plan WHERE target_intensity < 1000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, intensity, timestamp FROM light_intensity_data WHERE intensity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_name, address, floors FROM buildings WHERE floors >= 5 ORDER BY building_name;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date, building_name FROM sensors JOIN buildings ON sensors.building_id = buildings.building_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY installation_date;

SELECT plan_id, building_name, target_intensity, start_date, end_date FROM efficiency_plan JOIN buildings ON efficiency_plan.building_id = buildings.building_id WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY target_intensity DESC;

SELECT building_name, AVG(intensity) AS avg_intensity FROM light_intensity_data JOIN sensors ON light_intensity_data.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id JOIN buildings ON sensors.building_id = buildings.building_id GROUP BY building_name HAVING AVG(intensity) > 80;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE intensity > 0.5
SELECT s.location, sr.efficiency_score FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id JOIN analysis_results ar ON sd.data_id = ar.data_id ORDER BY sr.efficiency_score DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE intensity > 0.5 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM buildings WHERE building_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(intensity) AS max_intensity FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 3 ORDER BY max_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ar JOIN sensor_data sd ON ar.data_id = sd.data_id WHERE efficiency_score > 0.7 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT building_name, recommendation FROM buildings b JOIN efficiency_plan ep ON b.building_id = ep.building_id AND ep.analysis_result_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY building_name ASC;
